ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | slmd0vlid.v | |- V = ( Base ` W ) |
| 2 |  | slmd0vlid.a | |- .+ = ( +g ` W ) |
| 3 |  | slmd0vlid.z | |- .0. = ( 0g ` W ) |
| 4 |  | #P_slmdmnd | |- ( W e. SLMod -> W e. Mnd ) |
| 5 | 1, 2, 3 | #P_mndrid | |- ( ( W e. Mnd /\ X e. V ) -> ( X .+ .0. ) = X ) |
| 6 | 4, 5 | #P_sylan | |- ( ( W e. SLMod /\ X e. V ) -> ( X .+ .0. ) = X ) |
